Dynamic Navigation

Navigating a large department store can be overwhelming in person, let alone online. We strategically layered the navigation menu to provide the user with a clear department and sub-department information hierarchy. We imagined it just like the store: separate departments by floor, and separate the floors by brand.

Dynamic Navigation

Navigating a large department store can be overwhelming in person, let alone online. We strategically layered the navigation menu to provide the user with a clear department and sub-department information hierarchy. We imagined it just like the store: separate departments by floor, and separate the floors by brand.

Cross-Platform UX

Instead of duplicating a congested department store website like Macy's, the shopping experience was guided through catalogs. Another key, but often neglected part of design is limiting the width of the container in which content is displayed. Though this approach can be less visually appealing, we've found that user's prefer desktop experiences that mimic those of mobile.
